title: Polling-based coordination creates timing windows for stale signals
description:
## Location
- internal/loop/loop.go:334 (100ms wait watcher)
- internal/orchestrator/orchestrator.go:480 (250ms interrupt watcher)
- internal/orchestrator/orchestrator.go:1025 (250ms WaitAny)

## Problem
Agent can complete a turn before wait signal is detected. Stale signal fires on wrong turn. All coordination is polling-based with 100-250ms windows.

## Fix
Replace with channel-based signaling to eliminate timing windows.
